post that the decade-old Google troika of himself, Mr. Page and Mr. Sergey Brin had worked well in guiding the company to its current perch atop search engines and greater strength in other businesses. But he added: We have also agreed to clarify our individual roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. More informally, Mr. Eric Schmidt delivered this message on Twitter: "Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed!"

large drawing of Michael Vick in his Eagles uniform superimposed over Cowboys Stadium. It is headlined: "Super Bowl-- Dallas Dynasty 2011-- The Michael Vick Experience." Stateside after impressing on the UK version, but producers are unconvinced and believe American audiences may prefer a more recognisable star such as Rihanna or Katy Perry . A friend of Cheryl Cole 's rumoured boyfriend Derek Hough said: Everyone thinks Cheryl Cole has the judging job on US' X Factor' in the bag. "The truth is, nothing has been signed and the producers still aren't convinced. "They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US. Simon Cowell is now reportedly doing all he can to convince his American business partners that the 27-year-old Girls Aloud star has what it takes to draw audiences in across the Atlantic. Seattle, which had five players score in double figures, had its six-game home winning streak snapped. "Tonight( Allen Iverson ) was pretty consistent throughout the game knocking down shots," said Sonics coach Nate McMillan . Every time we tried to make a run it seemed like he came up with a big basket. When he has that going, there is nothing you can do except hope that he misses some shots. Keith Van Horn scored 26, Derrick Coleman had 14 points and 14 rebounds and Eric Snow also had a double-double with 14 points and 10 assists.
